content: your needles 5 on one needle and 6 on the other needle pick up 3 stitches from the body of the mitt so there are 6 stitches on one needle and 8 stitches on the other needle rounds 1 - 3 knit rounds 4 - 6 k1p1 rib bind off loosely in pattern weave in all ends - if there are any holes or loose stitches at the base of the thumb where you picked up the 3 stitches tighten the loose stitches and repair the holes with the loose end of the yarn that you attached to the thumb as you weave in the end
